{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-15T21:44:50.000Z", "description": "

Job Description

Major purpose: This engineer will need experience in SW design, digital communications, modems, and FPGA design.


Areas of desired experience or education include:

\u2022 Forward Error Correction (FEC)

\u2022 Modulation

\u2022 Demodulation

\u2022 Digital filters

\u2022 Baseband sampling

\u2022 Acquisition

\u2022 Tracking Algorithms


Major functions: Technical/Functional skills: Education/Experience/Licenses etc.:\tQualifications:

\u2022 Bachelor\u2019s (Master\u2019s preferred) degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering or Electrical Engineering.

\u2022 4+ years of experience implementing complex modem algorithms in DSP software.

\u2022 4+ years of equivalent experience in FPGA design with SW background will also receive consideration

\u2022 Preferred Skills:

\u2022 Expertise in C++ and object-oriented software design

\u2022 Expertise in software design for testability

\u2022 Expertise in laboratory debug techniques using digital scopes, logic analyzers, BERTS & other complex measurement equipment

\u2022 Experience with TI DSP BIOS RTOS is a plus.

\u2022 Familiarity with Git is a plus

\u2022 Familiarity with VHDL/Verilog and Matlab/Simulink is a plus
